A technologist with a â€œhuman touchâ€, Charbel co-founded his first startup â€” Human Micro Processing â€” in 1991. Since then, Charbel has helped companies worldwide to strategically use their information technology to more quickly and cost-effectively achieve their business objectives. SocialGrowâ€™s technical brain, Charbel previously held senior-level technical managerial positions with KokoFitness, Greenfield Online, Eleven Technology, Trimble Mobile Solutions, and Siebel Systems. Charbel earned his Ph.D. in Information Technology Management from Capella University in Minneapolis, Minnesota; his MBA from Concordia University in Montreal, Canada; and his Bachelors in Computer Science from [Lebanese American University] (http://www.lau.edu.lb/). Charbel enjoys keeping ahead of the game on cutting edge technologies.
